channel.title: github.io-podcasts example podcast
channel.description: The default/example podcast of github.io-podcasts! See https://github.com/TangentFoxy/github.io-podcasts for more information!

item.title: This #Title Contains @Special Characters and a looong title for testing purposes!
item.description:
This episode was published as a very fast test to make sure it works.

Let's make sure links and similar formatting works. Also this should be properly displayed as <img>: (I actually screwed it up and had to manually fix this. Whoops!)

item.title: Testing scheduled publication
item.description: I added a few new commands and I have no idea how well this will work but I am excited to try it!
